website_summaries.verdict: A durable and nice-looking hand warmer and charger at a good price.
pros: Durable 2-in-1 hand warmer and power bank that works well at charging a wide range of phones and devices
cons: Some claim battery charge doesn't last long enough

customer_reviews.title: GREAT. Must-have for Winter!
customer_reviews.text: As a person with an iron deficiency, I tend to get cold REALLY easy. I have searched every Winter for different clothing/products to help. This thing is amazing. Seriously. It charges quick, and warms up in seconds. It is incredibly easy to use, small enough to carry around easily, and I love that it comes with a carrying pouch and a lanyard. It's gonna be a dream this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: I use it so much I need an second one
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me in place of the otu hand-warmers and the boil-to-reset gel ones that I ruin with my frequent use. I use it so much that I need another one for when the first one is charging. And I'm already recommending it to my friends who have problems with cold hands a lot.
customer_reviews.author: s34w33d

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Every positive thing that others wrote about this product is true! I bought this product because, as a diabetic, I am not able to take a blood sugar reading if my hands are cold. This is perfect for solving that problem quickly and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great for Raynaud's syndrome
customer_reviews.text: My hands are always cold due to Raynaud's syndrome. This hand warmer fits great in my pocket. I wish it was warmer because I can't feel anything with gloves on but it works great with my gloves off. I love that it has a raised button so I can easily feel it and I love how one push turns it on to the high setting. I'm really thinking about getting a second one for my other pocket instead of switching it back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: C Hale

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hands toasty
customer_reviews.text: If there was a better way to turn the light on and off it would have gotten 5 stars. Ot does great at staying very warm, but the light turns on when sitting in pocket and doesn't want to turn off so it eats up battery life when the warmer feature is in use. Fix the light issue or just remove the light and you have a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: Get one! Give one!
customer_reviews.text: This little Gadget is amazing! My phone was on 7% charge. I don't think it was plugged into this thing more than 10 minutes when it was reading 45%. It charge my phone so fast and completely and was still warming my hands for a really long time after that. Worth every penny! It would make a great gift for somebody by the way. It even has a flashlight on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Must have for this winter
customer_reviews.text: It’s coming in really handy this season. I’ve been using the hand warmer throughout this week it has been a real life saver. It small and convenient enough to carry around in my pocket. When I’m not using to warm my hands I comes in hand a a back up power source for my phone
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Lasts one day
customer_reviews.text: This was my THIRD in two weeks. Worked for one day. Charged but would not turn on the following day.
customer_reviews.author: C J Mcmullin

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay hot very long. Would not re- order this one. Instructions to use it are poor.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not enough
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item, I think it was pretty cute and cool but as a cold nature who literally does not warm up easily, this gets hot but not enough for both of my icy hands. I kept switching it back and forth between both hands and it got pretty irritable and could not be flexible. I would rather spend much more for heated gloves where I am able to do chores while keeping my hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Olly Ali

customer_reviews.title: Dual function hot hand and illuminate
customer_reviews.text: I live in the north of New York. The winter is very cold. Every winter, the heating can't solve my frozen hands. With it, your hand is no longer cold and it can also be illuminated. It is very easy to use. I recommend everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: My mother received it as her Christmas present. She loves it. It is also a powerbank that she uses it for her phone. It is small and lightweight. Good quality. She is happy with this rechargeable hand warmer.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mother. She has Raynauds and gets extremely cold. This warmer is great she can still go to football and hockey games in the winter and keep her hands warm and safe. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: My youngest daughter lives in the state of Washington. Her hands git very very cold. She said this really helps when she outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: The hand warmer is really working well!. The maximum temperature is high enough to warm up hands or feet if you put it in your shoe. Great idea for winter. Great gift for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast
customer_reviews.text: This heats up fast and then you can turn off and it stays warm for a while as well. This is an amazing thing to have in a cold office or if you live in a cold enviornment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally warm for winter!
customer_reviews.text: This is so useful and efficient. Since I get really cold in the winter, this is great for my hands. Portable, works well, fits nicely in my coat pocket and bag, and keeps my hands toasty and warm! Love this so much, my fingers finally don’t feel frozen numb.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: It warms up very quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My hands are always so cold in winter when I go outside! It is small, and light weight. Put it in my pocket, it warms up very quickly! I think I should buy another one for both of my hand....
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Very hot,  short battery
customer_reviews.text: It gets extremely hot, however it only lasts about an hour. I haven't tried it for charging my phone yet
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES these! After over 25 years of marriage I finally found him a gift that he LOVES. He suffers from Raynauds Syndrome and struggles in the cool to frigid temperatures. These have made an amazing difference. No more rushing to the warm/tepid water to get the blood circulating back into his hands.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: gave this to fatherinlaw to use while hunting. He goes through 2 boxes of hand warm heat packs per season. This was easy for him to use and lasted on medium for 6 hours. He bragged about it and now wants to buy them for his hunting buddies.
customer_reviews.author: papa pc

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my trip being using it every day. Really worked and super warm. It is a size of my palm. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Feng

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: The best investment I made! Use it at work when the office decides to freeze me out! I brought it to the NY Jets football game in December and totally did the job. It’s great because it has the flashlight and you can charge your phone from it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heat
customer_reviews.text: can not wait to use in the really cold weather, what a great caring company
customer_reviews.author: Linda Vanderver

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot fast
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this as my client has Alzheimer’s and her hands always cold. It was a bit to difficult for her to use and she could not remember where she left it. Warms up fast and seemed to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Kate R.

customer_reviews.title: Great hand warmer
customer_reviews.text: This’s great hand warmers, it’s really easy to hold and lightweight. It’s easy to carry in my bag and it fits perfectly in my hand,it charges quick and warm up quick.it have three different colors, I choose blue, I love it so much. I will going to purchase another one for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: yan chen

customer_reviews.title: Functional well
customer_reviews.text: Potable size and light weight which is easy to hold. Getting warming fast.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Purchased another
customer_reviews.text: Liked the first one enought that I got another. Works as described
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: The size is small, it’s convenient to carry. There is three light to chose the temperature! Also, nice color!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mingwenliu

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great hand warmer! Exactly what I wanted. Easy to use and heats up very quickly, only takes 5 seconds to start feeling warm. Perfect for winter especially when it’s under 30 degrees, keeps me toasty still.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great hand warmer, but bad power buttom location
customer_reviews.text: Overall its a good hand warmer and works well as a cell phone charger. My only complain is the location of the on/off switch. The button is on the front of the device, which when in you pocket, can be easily turned on accidentally (and will get pretty hot).
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within a day and works perfectly. I primarily use it to warm my hands before a massage as my hands get cold. My clients appreciated the warmth yesterday. I plan to order another to keep my hands warm on dog walks.
customer_reviews.author: Tamsell

customer_reviews.title: Nice and hot.
customer_reviews.text: Hot. When fully charged, it’s hot even on lowest level. Put inside a sock to prevent skin contact.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. It would not charge up. Sent it it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McMeans

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: First time buy this hand warm , I used a couple of days it is worth what I paid.this Winter my hand got good taking care
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Burns so good
customer_reviews.text: Warms my hands when I work outside what more do you need. Only issue I had was trying to figure out temp controls but otherwise its a warming battery pack which sounds weird but hey it works
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recharge it
customer_reviews.text: The micro USB port was bent or offset so I couldn’t get the plug in to recharge it. Not sure I trust the product enough to replace it with another. Sad really as it warmed up really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: christine aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Temp lacks consistency to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Buttons don’t seem to work to adjust warmth- it just goes to 3-hot and wears out quickly. Also the flashlight activated and won’t turn off - losing charge more quickly. Not good for a full round of golf
customer_reviews.author: Loa

customer_reviews.title: Hot!
customer_reviews.text: This hand warmer gets really hot so it's great in your pocket but it gets too hot for bare hands. You can always turn it down but you'll need to wear gloves to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a very functional hand warmer.Easy to carry and the battery lasts long.You can also use this to charge your phone.
customer_reviews.author: YR

customer_reviews.title: Happy hands
customer_reviews.text: In the winter my hands always cold.That size is good to hold, just put it to the package go to shopping, it is really helped me hand warmer.it also a power bank compatible with my iPhone .It is cute ,I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: So cute I like it
customer_reviews.text: I'am so like this.It's small one,I can put it in my small bag to keep waring.and it. can select 3 different level of temperature.we're easy to use,I think I need buy one more for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: min chen

customer_reviews.title: Great hand warmer
customer_reviews.text: Love this hand warmer. Arrived quickly and will be out to good use. I live in the northeast and will be purchasing more for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Deweyskid

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Crap, turns on too easy, lasted two month in the garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Amazon customer service made this a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: There was a small issue with battery life but that was okay because the customer service was amazing and mad this purchase worth it.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas j.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's very warm and portable. There are different warm level to adjust. Fast to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: baoting

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: For those cold days when you have to stand outside.... this warms up your pocket and hands nicely!
customer_reviews.author: n e m

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold hands
customer_reviews.text: My wife has Reynauds and her hands get so cold. this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: W. Milhous

customer_reviews.title: Several useful features.
customer_reviews.text: A good product at a reasonable price. It has several useful features. The heating control can be a bit variable, but the problem is minor.
customer_reviews.author: John Gallicchio

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got the silver colored model for my best friend after already owning one of my own in the blue color. I love mine, and my bestie uses his a bunch as well!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: Case is too smooth making it very slippery. Otherwise it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Hand warmer
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my hands nice and warm while playing disc golf in this cold weather
customer_reviews.author: Angela D Evertse

customer_reviews.title: Small compact size fits easily in pockets.
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit for the hunters at Christmas. They love the charger, light and hand warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Permenter

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom because her hands are always cold. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works well but sometimes it takes long time to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: You need a micro USB out to be able to charge it.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have a micro USB out-put to connect this to, you'll need a male to male USB cable to be able to charge it. They could have made the connections clearer in the description! That adds about 8$ to the cost. It's really to big to do much with except put it in your pocket, which makes it useless unless you're just standing around outside. I bought it but somewhat doubt I'll ever get any use from it. The disposables warmers are better b/c they can be slipped into my mitts.
customer_reviews.author: cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Great little hand warmer
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday. I charged it up and tested it. It warms quickly with three settings. It comes with a wrist strap and softcover. Very comfortable in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: John V

product_meta.title: Senlleo Hand Warmer, Rechargeable Hand Warmer : 5200mAh Battery Hand Warmer/Powerbank with Mini Flashlight Function, Double-Sided Warmer Winter Gift for Girl/Men/Women
feature_bullets: 【3 in 1】Rechargeable hand warmer & 5200mah powerbank with Mini flashlight function. Lightweigh about 4.5 ounces. Fit for traveling, sports, fishing, hiking, camping, and skiing. as a warm solution in cold weather.

【Mini Led Light & Double-sided stay warm】The new mode it has a mini Led function. Small and pocket-friendly for on-the-go activities. As a rchargeable hand warmer, it has 3 levels of heat. Heat settings can be set to 107°F(42°C)/118°F(48)/131°F(55°C). A long press of the power button will turn it on or off . It is fast heating at 3-5 seconds and is warmed on both sides, keeping your hands cozy.

【Larger Capacity】5200mAh capacity battery can give a full charge to most digital devices. Ideal Compatible with iPad iPhone / Samsung / Nexus and other, all Android smart phones. Tri-level indicator to remind you of the remaining charge and heating status.
【Safe】Made of eco-friendly 18650 model lithium battery, high-tech aircraft-grade aluminum and ABS. It is shockproof, anti-scald, explosion-proof, and radiation-free. Completely safe heat transfer.

【What you get】Good New Year Gift. You get one New Model Senlleo 5200mAh Portable hand warmers, One Mirco USB cable, One travel pouch, One User guide, One Lanyard, If you have any problems, Please contact us via amazon e-mail for help if meeting any problem. We will respond within 24-hours and offer our Lifetime No Risk Technical Support.
